name: Xx_MLG_LOOMINARTY_ADVENTURE_SIMULATOR_2016_xX
description:
context: I made this in 2016 (duh) because I thought it was funny. It is absolutely terrible but honestly a good learning experience.

You are a man with a mission, to take out the illuminati like a true gamer eat doritos, drink mtn dew, and 360 no-scope your way through to main illuminati core. Your bois Sanic, Spoderman, and Xx_MLG_Swag_xX are counting on you.
